projects.title: Agentic RAG System
projects.description: Developed an Advanced RAG System for document-based question answering, leveraging LangChain for tool creation (e.g., booking callbacks), Pinecone for vector storage, and Google Gemini 1.5 Pro as the generation model. Implemented optimization techniques, including re-ranking, hybrid search, and prompt engineering, to enhance system efficiency and accuracy in retrieving and generating responses.
